##Datalitex

Datalitex is a Python library developed by Vinay Desai for data analysts and Python users who want a powerful, all-in-one toolkit to clean, analyze, manipulate, and visualize data directly from CSV files or pandas DataFrames.

---

## 🌟 Features

- 🚿 Automatic data cleaning (nulls, column stripping, duplicate removal)
- 🔍 Row/column filtering, custom querying, and type conversion
- 📊 Visualizations: histograms, scatter, bar, heatmap, pairplot, pie, and more
- 📈 GroupBy summaries, pivot tables, and crosstab reports
- 🧪 Outlier detection and removal (IQR, Z-Score)
- 🧠 Feature importance (correlation and ANOVA)
- 🧼 Encoding (Label, One-hot), Normalization & Standardization
- 🧾 Export cleaned/transformed data to CSV

---

## 📦 Installation

```bash
pip install datalitex
